sen.j: 晏子内親王（あんし（やすこ）ないしんのう、生年未詳 - 昌泰3年7月20日 (旧暦)（900年8月29日））は、平安時代の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Princess Anshi (Yasuko), the date of birth unknown - August 29, 900, was a member of the Imperial Family in the Heian period.
Imperial Princess Anshi (Yasuko), date of birth unknown - August 29, 900, was a member of the Imperial Family during the Heian period.
Imperial Princess Anshi (Yasuko), date of birth unknown - August 22, 900, was a member of the Imperial family during the Heian period.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ暦に訂正しました。family小文字にしました。

sen.e: She was the Saigu (Imperial Princess appointed to serve the deities of the Ise-jingu Shrine) of Ise.
She was the Saigu (Imperial Princess appointed to serve the deities of the Ise-jingu Shrine) of Ise.
She was the Saigu (Imperial Princess appointed to serve the deities of the Ise-jingu Shrine) of Ise.
She was the first daughter of Emperor Montoku.
She was the first daughter of Emperor Montoku.
She was the first daughter of Emperor Montoku.

sen.j: 母は藤原列子（藤原是雄女）。
sen.e: Her mother was FUJIWARA no Resshi (Tsurako) (daughter of FUJIWARA no Koreo).
sen.cmt: 是雄（これお）の読みは弓削是雄に倣いました。
sen.e: Her mother was FUJIWARA no Resshi (Tsurako) (daughter of FUJIWARA no Koreo).
Her mother was FUJIWARA no Resshi (Tsurako) (daughter of FUJIWARA no Koreo).

sen.j: 同母姉妹に慧子内親王がいる。
sen.e: Imperial Princess Keishi was her uterine sister.
Imperial Princess Keishi was her uterine sister.
Imperial Princess Keishi was her uterine sister.

sen.j: 嘉祥3年（850年）7月、父天皇の斎宮に卜定された。
sen.e: In July 850, Imperial Princess Anshi was selected by divination as the Saigu in the reign of her father.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In July 850, Imperial Princess Anshi was selected by divination as Saigu in the reign of her father.
In August 850, Imperial Princess Anshi was selected by divination as Saigu in the reign of her father.

sen.j: 翌年の仁寿元年（851年）8月、野宮に入る。
sen.e: In August 851, she entered the Nonomiya (Field Palace).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In August 851, she entered the Nonomiya (Field Palace).
In September 851, she entered the Nonomiya (Field Palace).
In September 852 she went down to Ise.
In September 852 she went down to Ise.
In October 852 she went down to Ise.

sen.j: 天安 (日本)2年（858年）9月、父天皇の崩御によって斎宮を退下した。
sen.e: In September 858 she retired from her office as her father, the Emperor demised.
In September 858 she retired from her office as her father, the Emperor died.
In October 858 she retired from her office as her father, the Emperor died.
She died on August 29, 900.
sen.cmt: 日付はpar 4にあわせて西暦です。
sen.e: She died on August 29, 900.
She died on August 22, 900.
